I'm having a problem to run the game. I think it's something to do with the "RE5DX9.exe" file.
First of all, when I enter the game and start a new game, the initial movies are not shown; I just hear the sound and see the subtitles, but the screen stays black all the time. And after that, when the game will start, an error window appears with the title "RESIDENT EVIL 5: RE5DX9.exe - Quit because of an error on the application", and in the window appears "D3DERR_DRIVERINTERNALERROR : present_result". When I click "OK", the game is closed. :(

I already updated the DirectX and my graphics card driver, but the problem persists.

Does someone knows how to resolve that?

Thanks!

I have just installed the game. But when one is set as graphics or controls or anything else, it's no English subtitles but there are signs or words that do not exist in this world. If you start the game it looks the same on .. how do I fix this
Its in japanice or chinese text... how do I get the englisg text?????? no info in the text-file

Language can be changed in the starting window where it asks you to choose if you want to run the game in directx9 or 10 version. 
There should be a language menu in the upper left corner, all you have to do is to choose english (or any other crap you speak in) in that menu.

What to do if I want to save my game?

The install menu is in jpanese but thats okey since theres like only back/next options and after the game has installed its in english.

For those who can't save the game the solution is to make an offline GFWL account.
Open Setup.ini file, last tab at the bottom named [Languages] and set default=411 option to 409
Thanks, Reloaded team
